name: bnoop
description:
The game where you bnoop the arrows, to the bneat!~

This game was made in 3 days for the 2020 love jam.

To change controls in game, press F1!

It toggles from arrow keys -> wasd ->askl ->dfjk.

Hopefully that helps if you're having trouble playing ^^

Credits: 

Sir_Silver (code)

Firehawk (music)
